name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
[Dear Zhiyong, let us not hear from each other from now on]
Xu Zhiyuan’s wife Li Qiaochu wrote a 2025 Spring Festival blessing poem for her husband and used AI to turn it into a song. She hopes to convey this deep affection to her lover far away through the sound of the wind on New Year’s Eve. At the same time, she also hopes that this song will meet someone who is destined to write it and sing it, giving it more human emotions and beauty. …
